link-sent.content-1: We have sent a link for you to update your Electronic Visa Waiver to
link-sent.content-2: Check your spam or junk folder if you can't find the email in your inbox.

evw-expired.content: You can no longer download your electronic visa waiver. This is because it is for a travel date in the past and has expired.

evw-not-verified.header: Your electronic visa waiver is not ready
evw-not-verified.content: We're still processing your electronic visa waiver application. We'll email you within 24 hours.

update-limit-reached.header: You can't change your flight details again
update-limit-reached.content-1: You can only change your flight details twice.
update-limit-reached.content-2: To travel on a different flight, you will need to apply for a
